description: Protect your iPad, Kindle Fire HD or any other tablets & eReaders with the Vertical Mobile Messenger Bag from CaseCrownStyleTablets & eReaders are in...who could deny it? So now it may be time to give yours something of its own! Enter the CaseCrown Vertical Mobile Messenger Bag. We have specifically designed this stylish nylon bag for tablets & eReaders. With vibrant color combinations and cool accents this bag is sure to make a statement.FunctionThe Vertical Mobile Messenger Bag with its multiple pockets provides the perfect place for your device and any other necessities that find their way into your life. With its stylish orange interior, vertical design, and adjustable shoulder strap attached you can be ready for anything!ProtectionThe best thing about this messenger bag has to be its interior padding. There is a padded divider on the inside with an elastic band and velcro closure to snugly secure your electronic devices in place so you do not need to worry about those little bumps and falls that happen to the best of us throughout the day.
title: CaseCrown Vertical Mobile Messenger Bag (Brown) for iPad 4th Generation with Retina Display, iPad 3 & iPad 2, Kindle Fire HD (Tablets & eReaders)
